typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		UserName as string,
		Folder as string,
		{Message-ID} as string,
		Date as string,
		From as string,
		To as string,
		Subject as string,
		Cc as string,
		MimeVersion as string,
		ContentType as string,
		ContentTransferEncoding as string,
		Bcc as string,
		XFrom as string,
		XTo as string,
		Xcc as string,
		Xbcc as string,
		XFolder as string,
		XOrigin as string,
		XFileName as string,
		body as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> StructuredData
